completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all objects of color X upto one step toward other objects, maintaining the relative position.
Move all objects of color X to the left by one cell.
Move all objects of color X to the center of the object if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color X toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color X upward and then remove them.
Move all objects of color 'X' to the center and occupy the position of any object they are moving towards.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node_max right)
            (move_node_max left)
            (move_node_max up)
            (move_node_max down)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color X until they are part of an object of color X.
Move all objects of color X one step to the center of the grid.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move objects of color X downward if there is empty space below them.
Move objects of color X towards objects of color X that are their neighbors, until they hit another object or the grid edge.
Move objects of color X away from each other if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color X towards the location at the left column of the grid.
Move all objects of color X, in the direction 'down'.
Move objects of color X to the positions with the most neighbors and eliminate the original positions
Move objects of size 2 near objects of color X to the position of the X objects, without overlapping.
Move the objects of color X towards the center of the grid.
Move objects of color X to form a vertical line crossing the objects of color X.
Move all objects of color X toward the center of the grid.
Move all objects of color X downwards.
Move all objects of color X one step up if they are neighbors of an object of color R.
Move each object of color X one step down.
Move all objects with color X upwards, if they are neighbors of an object of color R.
Move all objects of color X to the nearest edge.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move all objects of color X to the nearest empty cell following the direction of the object of color R they are neighbors of.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all objects of color X to create a clear horizontal path for red objects.
Move all objects to the positions of X objects if they are neighbors, and retain their original positions.
Move all objects of color X one step further in the direction they are already moving.
Move all objects of color X one step left.
Move the objects of color X up, one step at a time.
Move all objects of color X toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move objects of color X to the nearest object of color X, if they are in the upper left quadrant.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all objects of color X, toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all X objects one step down.
Move all objects of color X towards the center, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color X one cell down.
Move all objects of color X towards the center one step, aiming to group them together.
Move all objects of color X into an empty spot if they have enough neighboring space.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move objects of color X away from the objects of color X if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color X to the nearest object of color different than X, if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move the X objects and place them to the right of the first R object they encounter in each row.
Move all X objects toward the center column, if their initial position is not in the center column.
Move all objects of color X down by one cell
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move objects of color X towards the non-X objects if they are neighboring, otherwise move them up.
Move all objects of color X to form a vertical line along the center column, while keeping the existing objects intact.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move the objects of color X to positions with other closest X objects
Move all objects of color X vertically to close the gaps without overlapping.
Move the objects with color X that are neighbors to the objects with color R while keeping the initial 'X's positions.
Move all objects of color X toward objects of color R if they are neighbors.
Move all blue 'X' objects toward the nearest object of the most prevalent color in the grid, without combining or overlapping.
Move all objects of color X toward the center of the grid.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move objects of color X to their respective rows/columns and then replace X with O.
Move all objects of color X one step up.
Move all the objects of color X that are neighbors of each other towards the top edge.
Move all the X objects up by 5 steps.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node up)
            (move_node up)
            (move_node up)
            (move_node up)
            (move_node up)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color X, and then move all objects of color X.
Move all objects of color X up if they are not neighbors of objects of color X.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move all objects of color X one step downwards.
Move all X objects to the closest empty space, if there are no other objects in their path.
Move the objects of color X that are neighbors of other objects to the nearest border of the grid.
Move all objects of color X down to the bottom of the grid while filling their original position with color O.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move all objects toward the position of the color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color X up until they hit another object.
Move all objects of color X down.
Replace all objects of color X with the color O
Move objects of color X to their right, but only when there is no other object directly to their right.
Move all objects of color X to the boundary of the grid in the direction they already lie.
Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move all objects of color X to fill all available neighboring positions.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) X)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node_max up)
            (move_node_max down)
            (move_node_max left)
            (move_node_max right)
        )
    )
)

Move all objects of color X one step down.
Move all objects of color X, towards the direction of their neighboring objects of color R, until they hit another object.
Move all objects of color X toward objects of color R if they are neighbors.
Move objects of color X up
